flavorText: The built-in obstacles force competitors to think three moves ahead.

foreignData.flavorText: 備え付けの障害物のために、参加者は三歩先まで読むことを余儀なくされる。
foreignData.name: 歩哨の塔
foreignData.text: あなたのターンにインスタントかソーサリーである呪文が唱えられるたび、クリーチャー１体かプレインズウォーカー１体かプレイヤー１人を対象とする。歩哨の塔はそれに、このターンにその呪文よりも先に唱えられたインスタントかソーサリーである呪文の総数に１を足した数に等しい点数のダメージを与える。

foreignData.flavorText: 里面的障碍物迫使选手要提前算好三步之后的行动。
foreignData.name: 哨兵高塔
foreignData.text: 每当任一牌手在你的回合中施放瞬间或法术咒语时，哨兵高塔对任意一个目标造成伤害，其数量为本回合中于该咒语之前施放过的瞬间和法术咒语数量加1。

name: Sentinel Tower
originalText: Whenever an instant or sorcery spell is cast during your turn, Sentinel Tower deals damage to any target equal to 1 plus the number of instant and sorcery spells cast before that spell this turn.

rulings.text: For example, the first instant or sorcery spell cast during your turn causes Sentinel Tower to deal 1 damage; the second causes it to deal 2 damage, and so on.
Sentinel Tower’s ability resolves before the spell that caused it to trigger. It resolves even if that spell is countered.
Sentinel Tower’s ability counts all instant and sorcery spells cast in the turn before the spell that caused it to trigger, even if those spells are still on the stack or have been countered.
You choose the target for Sentinel Tower’s ability, regardless of who cast the spell that caused it to trigger.

text: Whenever an instant or sorcery spell is cast during your turn, Sentinel Tower deals damage to any target equal to 1 plus the number of instant and sorcery spells cast before that spell this turn.
